name: YourLife
description:
SHORT STORY

The game tells the story of a nineteen-year-old boy who lives with his parents. One day your life changed suddenly, your parents died in a car accident and you found out the truth that your parents concealed. You can find out more in the game.

General information

Hello, I would like to apologize in advance for any spelling mistakes, my native language is not English.

Just starting to make this game. Currently there are no sexual or romantic scenes there but they will appear in the future. I do the game in my free time, but I am determined to finish it.

If you have any ideas what I could add to the story, leave a comment. I will definitely consider all ideas. :)

I hope you like the game. I encourage you to leave your opinion so that I can know what I can improve, thanks for your time.

 greetings Lagunis.
